title: Students Losing Weight
question_text: Suppose a school nurse measured the weights of $10$ of her students. The weights have a mean of $104\text{ pounds}$ with a standard deviation of $11\text{ pounds}$ . If each student lost $5\text{ pounds}$ the next day, what would the new mean and standard deviation be?

choices.text: Mean = 104 lbs 104 lbs Standard deviation = 11 lbs 11 lbs
Mean = 99 lbs 99 lbs Standard deviation = 11 lbs 11 lbs
Mean = 99 lbs 99 lbs Standard deviation = 6 lbs 6 lbs
Mean = 104 lbs 104 lbs Standard deviation = 6 lbs 6 lbs
Mean = 52 lbs 52 lbs Standard deviation = 6 lbs 6 lbs
